text: Motion
Student Council President
Poster
School Announcement

All right, let's start shooting!
5 seconds before! 4, 3────......

Um, so, then, uh,
this small box is the school's "treasure"......

Yes, some Oni will chase after this "treasure"
once it's targeted.
If it gets stolen, it's game over in 10 minutes.

Please protect the "treasure" until sunset,
when the Oni become immobilized.

Can we count on
Illumination Stars for this?
Leave it to us!

(There's no script after the rules explanation...
Here we go.)

If we assume Meguru is holding the "treasure"...
what should we do next? Splitting up might be an option, but──
Hmm...
What's wrong? The Oni are here──!?

Oh, um, this "mission" notice,
I wonder what it is......

Mission!
Get a program from 1-A for the school festival.
Wow...!

This program has everything written down,
like what each class is doing for their booth...!

To all students on campus,
The mission in 1-A has been cleared!

For the next 10 minutes,
We'll be serving free cocoa at the cafeteria!

I see, clearing missions gives rewards,
and it helps liven up the school festival......
Wow...!
Amazing! Let's keep going and clear more missions!
